assets.description: Tirohia me te tirotiro i te ao me tō hoa AI me te tiki tohutohu me ngā māramatanga mō ngā mea e kite ana koe.
assets.content:
_Kei te wātea ināianei a Kitenga Copilot i Te Hononga o Amerika (hāunga i Iranoi me Tekāhi), ā, kei te horahora atu rā ki ngā mākete anō ākuanei._

# Pohewatia anōtia tāu e kite ai me te tirotiro mā te āwhina a Kitenga Copilot.

He tikanga hou a Kitenga Copilot hei tiritiri i ō wheako ki te AI me te kimi āwhina mai i te wā tūturu. He mea tēnei pēnā i ō whatu tuarua e wawe tonu ai te karapa, te tātari me te tuku māramatanga e ai ki tā Copilot e kite nei ki runga i tāu mata, mā roto rānei i te kāmera o tāu pūrere pūkoro. Ina pato mai koe ki Kitenga Copilot, ka taea ai e Copilot te kōrero mō āu kitenga.

![|poster=https://copilot.microsoft.com/static/copilotlabs/copilot-vision-video-1-cover.jpg](https://copilot.microsoft.com/static/copilotlabs/copilot-vision-video-1.mp4)

![|poster=https://copilot.microsoft.com/static/copilotlabs/copilot-vision-video-2-cover.webp](https://copilot.microsoft.com/static/copilotlabs/copilot-vision-video-2.mp4)




# He Pātai Auau

## Mā wai e āhei ai ki a Kitenga Copilot?

Kua roha ake i a mātou a Kitenga Copilot puta noa i a Edge, i a iOS, i a Android, i te Windows app anō hoki. Ko ngā kaiwhakamahi utukore kua 18 ōna tau, he pakeke atu rānei, e takiuru mai nei ki a Copilot mā tētahi pūkete Microsoft ka taea a Kitenga Copilot te whakamātau puta noa i a Edge, i a iOS, i a Android, i te Windows app anō hoki, ā, he whānui ake ngā teke whakamahinga mā ngā kaiohauru Copilot Pro. Kei te wātea ināianei a Kitenga Copilot i Te Hononga o Amerika (hāunga i Iranoi me Tekāhi), ā, kei te horahora atu rā ki ngā mākete anō ākuanei.

## Me pēhea tāku e uru atu ai ki a Kitenga Copilot i Edge?

Whakatuwherahia te pūtirotiro Edge ki tō papamahi. Me mātua takiuru e koe ki tō pūkete Microsoft whaiaro. I tō matapihi pūtirotiro Edge, patohia te ata Copilot i te kokonga matau o runga ake hei whakatuwhera i a Copilot i te pihanga taha. Whai muri iho, patohia te ata uruoro i raro iho o te pihanga taha hei tīmata i tētahi wātū ki a Kitenga. Mā te pūtito Copilot he ata mōhiti e whakaatu nei, koia te tohu nei rā kei te hohe ināianei a Kitenga. Me mōhio nei kua kore he pūwāhi uru o raro ki Kitenga mai i tō pūtirotiro Edge.

## Me pēhea tāku e uru atu ai ki Kitenga Copilot i tāku taupānga Android, iOS rānei?

Me mātua takiuru e koe ki tō pūkete Microsoft whaiaro. Mai i tō pūrere Android, iOS rānei, ka āhei atu ki Kitenga Copilot i roto i te aratau Reo o te taupānga Copilot. Ina tīmata mai koe i tētahi kōrero ā-waha ki a Copilot, ka puta ake ai te ata mōhiti hei tīmata māu i a Kitenga Copilot.

## Me pēhea tāku e uru atu ai ki a Kitenga Copilot i Windows?

Ka āhei atu ki Kitenga Copilot mai i te pūtito i roto i te Copilot i Windows app. Pāwhiria te ata mōhiti o Kitenga hei tīpako i tētahi matapihi taupānga tuwhera ki te tiritahi ki a Kitenga Copilot. I muri iho i tāu tiringa mai o tētahi matapihi taupānga tuwhera, ka taea ai e koe te ui mai a Copilot mō te ihirangi o te taupānga, te ui rānei, “whakaatu mai nei me pēhea” hei whakaoti i tētahi tūmahi mā runga i te āhuahira miramira.

Āhea āta horahoratia ai a Kitenga Copilot ki ngā kiritaki Copilot?

E āta pēnei ana mātou hei whakaemi urupare, hei toai i te hangarau, ā, ka māhorahora atu te urunga ki ngā pito Copilot atu anō ākuanei.

## E kā tonu ana a Kitenga Copilot i ngā wā katoa? Kei te tirohia tonutia e ia ngā mea i runga i taku matapihi pūtirotiro Edge, i taku mata papamahi, i taku whāngai kāmera pūkoro rānei?

Kāo, kāore a Kitenga Copilot e kā tonu ana. Ka hohe noa a Kitenga ina tīmatahia mai e koe tētahi wātū Kitenga. Ina haere tonu ana tētahi wātū Kitenga, ka puta ake he ata mōhiti Kitenga ki te pūtito Copilot, ko te tohu nei kei tētahi wātū Kitenga hohe ko koe. Ka mutu te wātū mēnā ka whakamutua e koe ki te pūtito, ka kati i te taupānga Copilot, ka kati i te matapihi tiritahi, ka tūroa rānei te wā e tautauā ana koe. Hei whakamahi anō i a Kitenga, pāwhiria te ata mōhiti i rō Pūtito hei tīmata i tētahi wātū kē atu.

## Ka rokia e Kitenga Copilot he tāurunga a te kaiwhakamahi, ka tuhi rangitaki rānei?

Kei te tuhia he rangitaki o ngā whakautu tauira a Copilot kia aroturukina ai ngā tauwhitinga haumarukore me ngā huaputa. E kore ngā atahanga, te ororongo reo me ngā horopaki a te kaiwhakamahi e tuhia ki te rangitaki, e rokia rānei. Ka kape tuhi i tō kōrero ā-waha ki a Kitenga hei wāhi o tō hītori kōrero. Ka taea e koe te hītori kōrerorero te muku ahakoa te wā.

## E hopu ana a Kitenga Copilot i ngā atahanga o tāku e titiro ana, me te rokiroki?

Kāo. Karekau he atahanga, he horopaki e puritia, e kape tuhi, e tuhia rānei ki ngā rangitaki. Mutu rawa atu te wātū, ko te katoa o aua raraunga ka mukua.

## Ka ahatia ngā pikitia tāku e tiri ana ki a Copilot?

Ahakoa ko Kitenga Copilot nāu i whakamahi ai, ahakoa kei te tukuatu i tētahi pikitia, ka āwhina atu a Copilot ki te whakamaru i ō raraunga me te pare i tō tūmataitinga. Ko ngā pikitia tāu e tukuatu ana, e hopu ana rānei ki a Kitenga ka tukatukatia anake hei whakautu atu ki tāu tono - ehara mā runga i aua mea ake hei whakaako tauira ā-AI, hei whakawhaiaro rānei i ō wheako. Kāore e rokia ana he topenga mata me ngā pikitia kāmera i tiria ai ki a Kitenga ā muri iho i te mutunga o tō wātū.

Ki te tiria e koe he pikitia ki rō kōrerorero, ki te whakamahia rānei hei waihanga pikitia, hei whakatika rānei, ko tēnā ka tukatukatia kia oti ai tāu tono, ka puritia pea tae noa ki te 30 rā, tae noa rānei ki tāu mukunga - ahakoa te tūponotanga tuatahi.

Ka tiakina pea he kape tuhi o ngā kuputuhi o ō tauwhitinga e hoki mai anō ai koe ki reira, ā, e aroturukina ai te tūkinotanga. Ehara mā runga i ēnei kape tuhi hei whakawhaiarotanga, ā, e taea tonutia ana e koe te muku ahakoa te wā.

E āta whakaatuhia ana e Copilot ina hohe a Kitenga, ā, kei a koe tonu te mana. Ka taea e koe ngā pikitia tukuatu, tō hītori ngohe rānei te muku mā ō tautuhinga pūkete Microsoft.

## He pēhea tā Copilot e raweke ai i ngā pikitia o ngā tāngata?

Ka tonoa pea e Copilot tāu whakaaetanga ki te tukatuka raraunga ine-koiora - pērā i ngā kanohi, ngā ringa rānei - ina whakamahi ana koe i ngā āhuahira, hei tauira ko Kitenga Copilot, te tukuatu pikitia rānei. E hāngai tonu ana te whakaaetanga mō te tukatuka ine-koiora i ia wā i ia wā e tukuatu ai koe i tētahi pikitia, ataata rānei, e hopu rānei kei whakamahia ana Copilot. Taea noatia ai te pēnātanga mā tāu whakamahinga o Kitenga Copilot me te waihanga pikitia me ngā utauta whakatika. Kia kotahi noa tāu tuku whakaaetanga, ā, e hāngai ana tēnā puta noa i ngā wheako Copilot katoa kei reira ko te tāuru pikitia, ataata me te hopu.

Ka tukatukatia anake he raraunga ine-koiora mēnā e tukuatu ana koe i ēnā, e hopu rānei, ā, ka whakamahia anake hei whakautu ki tāu tono. Hei tauira, ki te hopukia e koe tētahi kiriāhua me te tono i a Copilot ki te āwhina ki te whiriwhiri i tētahi taera makawe, ki te ako korowhio rānei, ka tātaritia pea ōu hanga kanohi hei tito ake i tētahi whakautu.

Kei a koe tonu te mana ki ngā mea tāu e tiri ai i ngā wā katoa. Mēnā ko tōu manakohanga nei kia kaua he raraunga ine-koiora e tukatukatia ai, kei whakamahi noa i ēnei āhuahira. Kaua he pikitia o ētahi atu e tiria me te kore ōna whakaaetanga.

## Ina whakamahia ana a Kitenga Copilot, kei te whakamahia e koutou ngā raraunga o te paetukutuku hei whakaako?

Kāo, kāore mātou e hopu, e rokiroki, e whakamahi rānei i ngā raraunga hei whakaako i ā mātou tauira. Mutu rawa atu te wātū Kitenga Copilot, ko te katoa o ngā atahanga, o ngā ororongo me ngā horopaki ka mukua. E rokirokia ana ngā whakautu tauira kia aroturukina ai he tauwhitinga haumarukore. E rokia ana tētahi kape tuhinga o tō kōrero ki roto i tō hītori kia pai ake ai te pūmahara o Copilot, ā, tē whakamahia hei whakaakoranga, hei whakawhaiarotanga rānei. Ka taea e koe te hītori kōrerorero te muku ahakoa te wā.

## Ka taea e au te puta atu i tēnei wheako hōu?

Āe. Mehemea e hiahia ana koe ki te hoki ki te wheako Copilot o mua i Edge me te kore ko Kitenga Copilot, ka taea ai te pēnā i ō Tautuhinga Edge. Haere atu ki te ripa Copilot me te paetaha, ka takahuri i a “Tukua a Kitenga Copilot ki te tiro i tō whārangi tukutuku” kia weto ai

He āhuahira kōwhiri kuhu mai a Kitenga Copilot i Pūkoro i roto i te aratau reo.

He āhuahira kōwhiri kuhu mai a Kitenga Copilot i Windows i te ata mōhiti o te pūtito Copilot.

## Ka weto tēnei āhuahira ina haere atu koe ki te whārangi tukutuku whai ake, ina tīmata rānei ki te whakamahi i tērā taupānga kē atu?

Kāo, e kā tonu ana a Kitenga kia whakamutua rā anōhia e koe te wātū mā te kati i te matapihi Edge, i te taupānga tiritahi rānei, mā te puta atu i te wheako i roto i te Pūtito Copilot. Māna e kite anaake ko te matapihi kua tiria e koe. E taea ana e koe te āta titiro nei mēnā e kā ana a Kitenga mā te haurapa i te ata mōhiti ki te Pūtito.

## E mahi tahi ana a Kitenga Copilot me ngā paetukutuku katoa, taupānga rānei?

E mahi tahi ana a Kitenga Copilot me te nuinga o ngā paetukutuku. Kāore tēnei e mahi ana ki ētahi pae, ā, ka āraia i runga i ērā kei roto rā he ihirangi tūkino, pakeke rānei. Ina toro atu rā koe ki tētahi pae e kore ai e hohe ana ināianei, ka whakaatu te Pūtito Copilot i tētahi whatu whai tohu rīpeka, ā, ka whakahētia e te tauira ki te matapaki i te ihirangi. Mō ētahi mōhiohio anō, tirohia ā mātou [Ture Whakamahi](https://www.bing.com/new/termsofuse).

Āe, e mahi tahi ana a Kitenga Copilot me ngā taupānga katoa i Windows. Heoi, mehemea he rauemi tūkino, pare-ā-DRM rānei i roto i te ihirangi, ka kore ai e taea e Copilot tērā te tātari.

## Ka kawe mana a Kitenga Copilot ki tāku pūtirotiro, ka whakatutuki rānei i ngā hohenga māku?

Kāore a Kitenga Copilot e pāhekoheko tika tonu ana ki te tukutuku māu; ko tōna take hei whakautu pātai, ehara i te mahi. Ka miramira ihirangi pea a Copilot i runga i te whārangi hei āwhina i a koe ki te kimi i te mōhiohio hāngai. E kore tēnei e pāwhiri, e tāuru kuputuhi, e panuku rānei māu.

## Mā hea e ārai ai ki te whakamahinga o Kitenga Copilot mō ngā take tūkino, anuanu, turekore rānei?

He mea tino nui ki a Microsoft te haumarutanga me te kaupare matihiko. Kāore e āhei ana ki Kitenga Copilot i ngā pae anuanu, tūkino hoki, ā, tē taea tēnei te whakamahi mō ngā kaupapa tūkino, anuanu, turekore rānei. Ako atu anō i [Te Hāpai i ngā tikanga whakahaere Hangarau whai haepapa](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/ai/responsible-ai).

## E taea ana a Kitenga Copilot te whakamahi i ngā ao arumoni/hinonga?

I tēnei wā, ko Kitenga he wāhi anake o te tukunga Copilot mā te kiritaki. Me tino takiuru e koe mā tētahi pūkete Microsoft hei whakamahi i ēnei āhuahira.

## He pēhea te rerekētanga o Kitenga Copilot ki a Maumahara?

Ko Kitenga Copilot me Maumahara he āhuahira rerekē, e rerekē ana ō rātou whāinga.

Ka mahi noa a Kitenga i roto i te horopaki o tāu e āta tiritahi ai i te wā o te wātū. Ko ngā topenga mata, ngā ororongo me te horopaki kāore e rokia. Ko te kape tuhinga anake o tō kōrero ka tiakina, ā, ka taea tonutia e koe te muku ahakoa te wā.

Kei te tautokona anake a Maumahara i [Copilot+ PCs](https://www.microsoft.com/windows/copilot-plus-pcs?r=1#faq2). Mā ngā kaiwhakamahi e kōwhiri kuhu mai rā, ka tango kapomata whakamuna a Maumahara o te mata ka rokiroki paetata ai. Ako atu anō i [Tūmataitinga me te mana ki runga i ō wheako Maumahara](https://support.microsoft.com/windows/privacy-and-control-over-your-recall-experience-d404f672-7647-41e5-886c-a3c59680af15).

assets.title: Ngā Wheako Kēmutanga Copilot
assets.description: He whakaaturanga rangahau i te pūtahitanga o te kēmutanga ki te AI.
assets.content:
_E wātea ana ngā Copilot Gaming Experiences i tēnei wā i te reo Ingarihi i te copilot.microsoft.com mā ngā kaiwhakamahi neke atu i te 18 tau._

# Whai wāhi mai ki ngā tauwhitinga ā-AI e āhei ai he ara hei purei.

Nau mai ki tētahi wheako purei kēmu whākaha-ā-AI, whakamātautau, he mea taurima ki rō Copilot Labs. He mea e whākahatia nei e te Tauira o te Ao Manawakura me ngā Mahi ā-Tangata (WHAM) nā Microsoft Rangahau i hanga ai, ko tā tēnei tauira pāhekoheko o te hangarau he titiro tōmua ki te āhua o te whakatau a te atamai hangahanga waihanga i te purei kēmu pāhekoheko.

He whakaatanga tā Wheako Kēmu Copilot i tētahi kaupae whakamua ki te tūhura i te āhua o te waihanga a te AI i ngā ara hou hei pāhekoheko atu rā ki ngā kēmu i a ia e hanga ake nei i ngā mea tīariari. Mā te waihanga purei kēmu i te wā tūturu, ka whakaatu nei te Manawakura taketake i te pohewatanga anō o ngā kēmu tauhira pērā i a Quake II mā runga hangarau AI ā moroki noa nei.

![](https://copilot.microsoft.com/static/copilotlabs/copilot-gaming-image-1.jpg)

I roto i tēnei tauira pāhekoheko o te wā tūturu, e hihiri ana tā Copilot e waihanga ai i ngā raupapa purei kēmu i whakahihikotia rā e te kēmu tauira, a Quake II. Ko ia tāurunga nāu i whakaoti ai he keu atu o te wā waihanga-ā-AI e whai ake nei i roto i te kēmu, me te mea nei ko koe anō kei te purei i te Quake II tūturu e haere ana i tētahi pūkaha kēmu tuku iho. Kia hari i te wheako, tiria mai ō whakaaro, ka āwhina hoki ki te hanga i te wā heke o ngā wheako purei kēmu whākaha-ā-AI.

Kia mōhio nei: Kei a ia wātū tauira pāhekoheko he tepe wā ināianei.




# He Pātai Auau

## He aha ngā Wheako Kēmu Copilot?

Ko ngā Wheako Kēmu Copilot he wheako whākaha-ā-AI, whakamātautau e ora ake ai te rangahau inati tōna hou i roto i Copilot Labs. He mea hanga ake i runga i te hangarau, arā, te Tauira auaha o te Ao me ngā Mahi ā-Tangata (WHAM) nā Microsoft Rangahau, e hihiri ana tā Wheako Kēmu Copilot e waihanga ai i ngā whakaari kēmu me te whakautu atu ki ngā tāurunga a te kaipurei i te wā tūturu, nā reira ka whakatarunatia ai he purei kēmu pāhekoheko me te kore e whakawhirinaki ki ngā pūkaha kēmu tuku iho. He mea hoahoa pēnei i tētahi tauira pāhekoheko poto, kotahi-meneti, ko tēnei hei mawhiti mā ngā kaipurei ki roto i ngā wheako kēmu ā-AI o te reanga e whai ake nei.

## He aha te WHAM? He pēhea ia e mahi ai?

Ko ngā Wheako Kēmu Copilot he Tauira o te Ao me ngā Mahi ā-Tangata (WHAM), arā, ko tā mātou tauira atamai hangahanga waihanga e tino auaha nei, ka hihiri ai tāna waihanga whakaari purei kēmu me tāna whakataruna i ngā ritenga a te kaipurei i te wā tūturu. Ko tōna whanaketanga nā Microsoft Rangahau i whakaputaina ina tata noa nei i te hautaka pūtaiao, arā ko Nature, he tohu nui o tētahi kaupae whakamua i tā mātou kaha ki te hanumi i te rangahau ki te auaha hua i te ao tūturu.

## He aha te wheako i rō Copilot Labs?

Kei te kūmea koe e tēnei tauira pāhekoheko paku ki roto i tētahi mokowā pāhekoheko e whakahihikotia nei e Quake II kei reira e hanga ana te AI i ngā whakaaritanga rumaki me te mahi urupare ā mea ake nei. He karipi tino auaha nei ki tētahi ara tino hou o te pāhekoheko atu ki ngā kēmu, nō reira ka panonihia te rangahau inati tōna hou hei tauira pāhekoheko tere, pārekareka e taea hoki te purei.

## He aha ngā kēmu e wātea mai nei i te wheako tuatahi o Copilot Labs?

E whākahatia ana te wheako tuatahi i runga i Copilot Labs e tētahi tauira Wheako Kēmu Copilot, he mea whakaako i te purei kēmu nō Quake II.

## Me pēhea tāku uru ki tēnei tauira pāhekoheko?

Ka āhei atu ki te wheako mā runga i tētahi whārangi tukutuku whakaihi o Copilot Labs. He mea hoahoa tēnei hei whakamahi anake i te papamahi, inā kei te whakawhirinaki te tauira pāhekoheko ki ngā mana ā-papapātuhi me ngā tāurunga.

## Kei te wātea rānei te wheako i ngā pūrere pūkoro?

Ināianei, kāo. He mea arotau te tauira pāhekoheko whakamātautau o te hangarau mō ngā pūtirotiro papamahi i te mea e hiahiatia ana e te wheako tētahi papapātuhi ōkiko kia whaitake ai tōna whakahaerenga.

## Me pēhea tāku whakahaere i te kēmu?

Mā runga tāurunga ā-papapātuhi e whakahaeretia ai te kēmu.

- **Te Nekeneke**: Mā runga i te **WASD** hei whakaneke (e whakataruna ana i tētahi kakau mauī).
- **Te Titiro Tītaha**: Mā runga i ngā **Pātuhi Pere** hei whakarite ake i tō tirohanga (e whakataruna ana i tētahi kakau matau).
- **Peke**: Patua te **Mokowā**
- **Tuohu**: Patua te **C**
- **Pupuhi**: Patua te **F**

## E wātea rānei tēnei tauira pāhekoheko o te hangarau hei whakamahi arumoni, hei whakamahi rānei mā ngā hinonga?

Ko te tauira pāhekoheko o te hangarau i Copilot Labs mā ngā kiritaki hei ngana i ngā Wheako Kēmu Copilot. Heoi anō, e wātea ana te tauira rangahau taketake o ngā Wheako Kēmu Copilot ki ngā kaiwhakawhanake hei ngana kei Whakahaere Azure.

assets.title: Ngā Hohenga Copilot
assets.description: Tukua atu ngā tūmahi ki a Copilot. Whakamahia ngā kupu whāngai kia oti ai i a Copilot ngā tūmahi tukutuku, pēnei i ngā tāpuitanga me ngā tāpuitanga haere.
assets.content:
_Kei te wātea a Ngā Hohenga Copilot ki nga kaiwhakamahi kua haina ki Copilot puta noa i te ao, haunga i te Horahanga Ohaoha o Ūropi (EEA), Parahi, Kānata, Tonga Kōria, Huiterangi, Te Hononga o Piritene Nui, me Whitināmu. Ako i ētahi anō mea mō Ngā Hohenga i Edge [konei](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2337628)._

# Kei te tukutuku

Tukuna a Copilot kia āwhina i a koe ki ngā tūmahi tukutuku. Ka taea e Copilot ināianei te hoa me koe ki te whakaoti tūmahi i muri i ngā tirohanga. Whakamahia ngā kupu whāngai kōrerorero ngāwari hei tono i a Copilot ki te mahi i ngā tūmahi tukutuku, mai i te tāpui tīkiti, te whakarite tāpuitanga hapa, te tuku rānei i tētahi koha ngākau mahara me te pātai i a Copilot kia āwhina ki te whakawhiti atu i tō rārangi.

I muri i te tīmatanga o tētahi tūmahi, ka taea e koe te tūtatari, te whakatū, te whakahaere, me te whakakē i tō tono. Ka mahi Ngā Hohenga Copilot ki te nuinga o ngā paetukutuku, nā reira whakamātauria me te whakamōhio mai i ō whakaaro.

# I runga i tō rorohiko Windows

Ahakoa kei te whakamātautau koe, ahakoa kei te whakaako, ahakoa kei te whakamātau rānei i tētahi mea hou, mā Copilot 3D ka māmā ai te tīmatanga ake.

# He aha tāu e tūhura atu rā ki Copilot 3D?

- Kia wawe tonu te panonitanga o āu pikitia hei tauira ahu-3
- Kia maurua-kore te kōmitimiti ki ngā kēmu, ki te tānga ahu-3, ki te hoahoa, ki te VR/AR, ki ngā ihirangi matihiko, ki ngā kaupapa toi me te maha atu
- Uru mai ki ngā puna hihiko whakariterite e whakahiratia ana ngā tirohanga kohure, koia nei he mea hoahoa kia rere atu rā ō whakaaro ka ora wawe atu ai ēnā

![](https://copilot.microsoft.com/static/copilotlabs/copilot-3d-video-1.mp4)

# KItea nei ngā arawātea i Copilot 3D

![](https://copilot.microsoft.com/static/copilotlabs/copilot-3d-video-2.mp4)




# He Pātai Auau

## He aha te Copilot 3D?

He utauta whākaha-ā-AI a Copilot 3D e tāuke ana ki a Copilot Labs, mā tēnei ka āhei ai ngā kaiwhakamahi tētahi pikitia takitahi te huri hei tauira ahu-3 tāhuahua rawa - karekau he wheako o mua i te hiahiatia. He mea hoahoa tēnei kia tere ai te waihanga ahu-3, kia tomopai ai ki tērā, kia ihumanea hoki.

Ahakoa kei te tūhura ariā koe, ahakoa kei te whakamātau i tētahi ariā, ahakoa kei te ārahi rānei i te akoranga ā-ringa, ka tautokona e Copilot 3D te whakamātautau pohewa me te kore te whīwhiwhi o te pūmanawa rorohiko ahu-3 o nehe rā.

## Mā wai e āhei ai ki a Copilot 3D?

Ahakoa he ohaurunga whai utu e kore ai e hiahiatia, me tino takiuru mai ngā kaiwhakamahi mā tana Pūkete Microsoft whaiaro hei uru mai ki tēnei āhuahira. Kei te wātea a Copilot 3D ki ngā kaiwhakamahi o te ao whānui.

Hei whakamahi i a Copilot 3D, whakatere atu rā ki [Copilot.com](https://copilot.com) i tētahi pūtirotiro ā mohoa ake. Ināia tonu nei, ko te tūtohunga nei me whakamahi i runga i tētahi rorohiko papamahi, engari ka āhei atu ki reira mā ngā pūtirotiro pūkoro.

## E tautokona ana e Copilot 3D te waihanga kuputuhi-ki-ahu-3?

Ināia tonu nei, e tautokona ana e Copilot 3D te waihanganga o te pikitia ahu-2 ki te pikitia ahu-3.

## Ko ēhea hōputu kōnae e wātea ana hei tikiake?

Ināianei, e tautokona ana e Copilot 3D ngā tikiake i te hōputu GLB e tino hototahi ana ki ngā pūtiro ahu-3, ki ngā utauta hoahoa, ki ngā pūkaha kēmu hoki.

## Ka tiakina āku tauira ahu-3 i waihangā ai?

Āe - ko āu waihanganga ka tiakina ki tō whārangi, arā Aku Waihanganga mō te 28 rā. Whai muri mai nei, ka tangohia aunoatia atu i tā mātou pūnaha. Ka taea anō hoki e koe te muku ā-ringa ahakoa te wā.

## He pēhea āku pikitia tukuatu e whakamahia ai?

Mā runga pikitia tukuatu ka waihangā ai e Copilot ō tauira ahu-3 me te tukatuka i tāu tono. Ināia tonu nei, kāore a Microsoft i te whakamahi i ngā pikitia tukuatu hei whakaako, hei whakawhaiaro rānei.

## He aha ngā momo pikitia e taea ana te tukuatu ki Copilot 3D?

E tautokona ana e Copilot 3D he kōnae PNG, JPG rānei e iti iho ana i te 10 MP.

Waihoki, me tukuatu ngā ihirangi anake e whakaaetia ana koe ki te whakamahi. Me whai e ngā waihanganga ā-Copilot 3D tā mātou [Tikanga Whanonga](https://www.bing.com/new/termsofuse) ,ā, kaua rawa he rauemi whai manatārua e takahia.

Kia maumahara tonu - ko te tikanga nei me tūturu te katoa o ngā pikitia tāu e tukuatu ana, he mea nāu anō i pupuri, he mea rānei kei ā koe te mōtika ki te whakamahi. Kaua e tukuatu i ngā pikitia e takahia ana ngā mōtika o ngai kiritoru (tae noa ki ngā mōtika manatārua, moko pakihi, haurongo rānei), e tūkinotia te tūmataitinga o ētahi atu, e whakaurua mai he whakaahuatanga o ngā tāngata me te kore he whakaaetanga, e tūkino rānei i te [Whakaaetanga Ratonga Microsoft](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/servicesagreement?msockid=0d155ac0407264171ee04ff1418265be) me [Te Tikanga Whanonga a Copilot](https://www.bing.com/new/termsofuse).

Kei ā koe anake te haepapa mō ngā pikitia tāu e tukuatu ana. Ka rāhuitia pea tō pūkete tāu whakamahinga Copilot rānei, ka whakatārewatia rānei mehemea ka kitea e mātou tētahi nganatanga ki te tukuatu i ngā ihirangi turekore, i ngā ihirangi rānei e tūkinotia ana te Tikanga Whanonga Copilot.

assets.title: Ngā Kīanga Ororongo Copilot
assets.description: He utauta whakamātautau i hoahoatia mō te waihanga ororongo i runga i te ngāwari mā te whakamahi i ngā tauira whakatipuranga reo hōu rawa a Copilot.
assets.content:
_E wātea ana ngā Kīanga Ororongo Copilot i te reo Ingarihi. Kei te tūhura huarahi mātou hei tautoko i ētahi atu reo i roto i te wa._

# Waihangā he kōrero ā-waha i roto i ngā hēkena mā Ngā Kīanga Ororongo Copilot

Ko ngā Kīanga Ororongo Copilot he whakamātautau nā Copilot Labs e huri ana i ngā kupu tuhituhi hei kupu kōrero māori noa—kī tonu i ngā kare ā-roto, te haukiri, me te huatau. Ka taea e koe te whakarite i te tangi o te reo kia ōrite ai ki tō kupu whāngai, mēnā e tono ana i tētahi hā mārire mō tētahi pūrākau i te wā moe, he karere hihiri mō tētahi kōrero whakakipakipa, he whakareitanga whakaari rānei mō tētahi mātātoa hautoa. Kia māmā te tikiake i ngā tauira ororongo hei whakamahi mō te waihanga ihirangi.

Kei roto hoki ko te **Aratau Paki**, e tuituia tahia ana ngā tini tātaitanga reo kia waihangā ai he wheako kōrero paki pārekareka, whakatapoko hoki - he tino pai mā ngā mātua, mā ngā kaiwhakaako, aha atu aha atu. Ka tukuna e Ngā Kīanga Ororongo he tirohanga ki te āhua e taea ai e AI te whakarite ake i te ihirangi ororongo rumaki atu, pūkare atu, me te ngahau mō te katoa.

![](https://copilot.microsoft.com/static/copilotlabs/audio-expression-image-2.png)

# Ngā Āhuahira Wātea

I roto i Ngā Kīanga Ororongo Copilot, ka taea te whakamātautau i ngā tautuhinga reo hei tūhura i ngā kāhua kōrero rerekē:

- Mā te **Aratau Kakare**, tukua he huahua tuhinga whakaari (kupu whāngai), ka meinga nei kia whakaaritia ai e Copilot ki ngā tūmomo tātaitanga.
  - Urutaua te hā me te tere o te pūpānui—mai i te kōhimuhimu whakamārie ki tētahi umere hiamo—kia taurite ai ki te wairua o tēnā kāpeka, o tēnā kāpeka.
  - Tautapaina tētahi reo kohure kia hihiri ai tō kōrero, kia ora tonu hoki.
- Whakamātauria te **Aratau Pūrākau** ki te whakarongo ki āu ake pūrākau i whakaorangia me ngā kōrero whakapuaki **me ngā atahanga muramura**.
- Mā runga **Aratau Hōtuhi** e tere ai te tahuritanga ā-TTS o tāu hōtuhi hei ororongo.
- Tīkina ake ngā tauira ororongo hei whakamahi i ō kaupapa whaiaro




# He Pātai Auau

## Mā wai e āhei ki te whakamahi i ngā Kīanga Ororongo Copilot?

He koreutu te whakamahi i ngā Kīanga Ororongo Copilot. E wātea ana i te ao whānui, ā, ka mahi i tētahi pūtirotiro hōu. I tēnei wā, e tautoko ana tēnei utauta whakamātautau i te reo Ingarihi anake. Mō te wheako tino pai, e tūtohu ana mātou kia whakamahi i tētahi rorohiko papamahi, ahakoa ka taea hoki te uru mā ngā pūtirotiro pūkoro.

## He aha te rerekētanga i waenga i te Aratau Kakare me te Aratau Pūrākau?

- **Aratau Kakare** – Māu e homai tāu ake huahua tuhinga whakaari me he kupu whāngai, ka kōwhiri i tētahi kiripuaki reo me te tātaitanga e tauwhāiti ana, ā, ka whakareitia e Copilot tēnā kia tino pai ai te whakarongo.
- **Aratau Pūrākau** – Ka tiritiri koe i tētahi ariā pūrākau, i tētahi tohuāki poto rānei, ā, ka hangaia e Copilot tētahi hōtuhi ritenga, ka tīpako i te pūāhua reo tino tika, me te whakaora i tō pūrākau **me tētahi atahanga uhi taurite**.
- **Aratau Hōtuhi** - Māu he hōtuhi tūtahi e tuku ai, ā, ka pānui horipū ā-waha ai a Copilot He tino pai mō ngā arokite tere, mō te whakataki rānei e rite ana kia whakaputaina ai.

## E hia ngā kīanga ororongo ka taea e au te hanga, te tikiake hoki?

Kāore he tepenga tautuhi— engari ka rerekē pea tēnei i runga anō i te popono. E rerekē haere ana te roanga o tēnā kīanga o tēnā kīanga - mō tētahi kupu whāngai i homai nei, he āhua 30 hēkona (Aratau Kakare) ki te āhua 90 hēkena (Aratau Paki) o ngā kōrero e waihangā ai e te utauta, i te nuinga o te wā.

## He aha te hōputu kōnae mō te tikiake i taku ororongo?

Kua tukua ngā kīanga ororongo katoa ki te hōputu MP3 kounga-tiketike, kua rite mō te tiritiri, te tāmau, te purei anō rānei puta noa i ngā pūrere.

## He tohutohu mō ngā mea ka taea e au te whakamahi i ngā Kīanga Ororongo Copilot?

Hei whakamahinga whaiaro Ngā Kīanga Ororongo Copilot e hāngai ana ki te Tikanga Whanonga Copilot.

Kia maumahara — me tāuru anake koe i āu anō ihirangi, i ērā rānei kei a koe ngā motika whakamahi. Kaua e tāuru, tārua, tono ororongo rānei e takahi ana i ngā motika o ētahi atu (tae atu ki te manatārua, moko, mana whakatairanga rānei), e takahi ana i te tūmataitinga o ētahi atu, e takahi ana rānei i te [Whakaaetanga Ratonga Microsoft](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/servicesagreement?msockid=0d155ac0407264171ee04ff1418265be) tērā rānei [Ngā Ture Copilot](https://www.bing.com/new/termsofuse).

Ka rāhuitia, ka whakatārewatia pea rānei tō pūkete, tō urunga ki Copilot rānei mēnā ka kitea e mātou he ngana ki te tāuru, ki te whakaputa rānei i ngā ihirangi ture kore, ngā ihirangi rānei e takahi ana i te [Tikanga Whanonga Ture Copilot](https://www.bing.com/new/termsofuse).

Kei te āta whakawāteatia a _Copilot Portraits hei whakamātautau i Copilot Labs. Kei te tīmata mātou ki tētahi rōpū kaiwhakamahi whāiti i Te Hononga o Amerika, Te Hononga o Ingarangi, me Kānata ki te kohikohi urupare me te whakarite i tētahi wheako tino kounga i mua i te whakawhānui i te āheitanga._

# He whakamātautau rumaki i hangaia mō te whakaharatau i ngā kōrerorero o te ao tūturu mā te reo me ngā arokite.

Kite wheakotia tētahi ahu hou o te tauwhitinga AI me Copilot Portraits. Ka panoni tēnei whakamātautau i ngā kōrerorero reo mā te tāpiri urupare arokite tāoreore. Kōwhiria mai i ngā kāhua kiritangata ahurei e 40 me te mātakitaki i a rātou e urupare ana ki ngā kīanga tukutahi i a koe e kōrero ana.

He tino pai mō te ohia manomano auaha, te mahi uiui, me ngā wātū akoranga, mā Portraits e whakangahau ake ai ngā kōrerorero AI me ngā arokite wā tūturu. Kua āta whakahuatia ia whakaahua kiritangata, ā, ehara i te whakaahua noa te āhua, e tuku ana i ngā momo arokite ki a koe me te whakamahi i aua āhuahira atamai me ngā āhuahira haumaru Copilot e whakawhirinaki ana koe.

# Ka pēhea e mahi ai

- **Tūhura & Kōwhiri**: Tūhuratia kia 40 ngā whakaahua tāoreore ahurei me te kōwhiri i te āhua e pai ana māu.
- **Meinga Māu**: Kōwhiria tētahi reo e pai ana ki a koe, whakapiri noa rānei ki te kōwhiringa tatūkē.
- **Tīmata ki te Kōrerorero**: Tīmata ki te kōrero ka kite i tō whakaahua kiritangata e urupare ana me ngā urupare arokite.
- **Whakaharatau & Ako**: He tino pai mō te whakaharatau i ngā tauari o te ao tūturu, te kōrero tūmatanui, te whakarite uiui, te ohia manimano ngātahi, me te ako i tētahi mea hou.

# Ngā Tikanga Haumaru

Ka whakaarotautia e Copilot Portraits ngā mahi hou AI whai takohanga me ngā tikanga whakahaumaru maha. E whakaatu ana tēnei whakamātautau i ngā whakaahua 40 kua tīpakohia kētia, he whakaahua ehara i te whakaahua tūturu te āhua kia āta kitea te rerekētanga mai i ngā tāngata tūturu. Ko ngā kōrerorero katoa e whakahikotia ana e ngā hanganga haumaru me ngā tātari ihirangi a Copilot.

Hei whakatītina i te whakamahinga hauora, kua whakatinanatia e mātou ngā tepe wā mō ia wātū me ia rā. E wātea ana ki ngā kaiwhakamahi 18+ anake i ngā mākete tīpako hei tīmatatanga, kei roto i tēnei whakamātautau Taiwhanga ngā whakaaturanga AI pūmau me te tapanga mārama kei te tauwhiti koe ki te hangarau AI.




# He Pātai Auau

## Me pēhea e taea ai e au te whakamātau i tēnei whakamātautau?

Whakamātauria Copilot Portraits i roto i Copilot Labs i tō pūtirotiro [https://copilot.microsoft.com/labs](https://copilot.microsoft.com/labs). I hoahoatia tēnei āhuahira whakamātautau hei whakamātau i ngā huarahi hōu o te kōrerorero ki te AI. Me 18+ koe me tētahi pūkete manatoko kia uru ki tēnei whakamātautau. Kei te tīmata mātou ki tētahi rōpū kaiwhakamahi whāiti i Te Hononga o Amerika, Te Hononga o Ingarangi, me Kānata ki te kohikohi urupare me te whakarite i tētahi wheako tino kounga i mua i te whakawhānui i te urunga.

## E hia ngā whakaahua kiritangata ka taea e au te kōwhiri?

I tēnei wā ka tukuna e te whakamātautau e 40+ ngā whakaahua i hoahoatia kētia. Ka taea e koe te tirotiro i ngā kōwhiringa katoa kia kitea ai ngā whakaahua e hono ai koe, e māhorahora ana rānei ki a koe. He kāhua arokite me te āhua ahurei tō ia whakaahua kiritangata, engari he mea whakahiko ngā whakaahua katoa e te mōhiohio Copilot ōrite.

## Ka taea e au te whakarite ake i ngā whakaahua kiritangata?

Ka taea te tīpako mai i ngā kōwhiringa reo a Copilot o nāianei kia ōrite ki te āhua o ia whakaahua kiritangata. Pāwhiri noatia te pātene Gear hei uru ki te matapihi tautuhinga Reo i raro o te whakaahua kiritangata. Mai i reira, ka taea te tīpako tētahi o ngā reo Copilot e wātea ana mō tō whakaahua kiritangata.

## He aha ngā momo kōrerorero e tika ana mō tēnei whakamātautau?

He tino pai a Copilot Portraits mō te ohia manomano auaha, te whakaharatau i ngā whakaaturanga, te ruku hōhonu ki ō wāhi kaingākau, te ako i ngā pūkenga hōu, te tiki tohutohu, ngā urupare arokite wā tūturu rānei ka āwhina i a koe ki te kōrerorero tonu.

## Māō ngā kiritaki, hinonga rānei a Copilot Portraits?

He wheako aro ki te kiritaki tēnei e whakarewaina ana i Copilot Labs.

## He aha te hangarau e whakahaere ana i tēnei whakamātautau?

Ka whakamahia e tēnei whakamātautau te VASA-1, he hangarau AI whatutoto i hangaia e Microsoft Research hei waihanga i ngā kōrerorero AI ā-wā tūturu, arokite anō hoki. Mā te wairua kōkiri mea hou e āhei ai mātou ki te hanga i ngā tohu kanohi māori noa, ngā nekehanga upoko, me te tukutahi-ngutu mai i te atahanga kotahi noa iho - kāore he tauira ahu-3 matatini e hiahiatia ana. Mā tēnei e waihanga te urupare arokite māeneene hoki ka kitea e koe ina kōrerorero ki ia whakaahua kiritangata. Mō ngā taipitopito hangarau, tirohia te [Pepa rangahau VASA-1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/project/vasa-1/).

## Me pēhea e whakarite ai a Microsoft kia haumaru te whakamahi i tēnei hangarau?

He maha ngā tikanga haumaru kua whakaritea.

- Ka pā katoa ngā tātari haumaru tīariari a Copilot (te ārai i ngā ihirangi kino, te kōrero kino, me ētahi atu).
- Kua āta whaihangatia ngā whakaahua kiritangata, ehara i te whakaahua tūturu te āhua, kia kore ai e pōhēhē he tāngata tūturu ērā.
- Ngā kaiwhakamahi neke atu i te 18 tau anake.
- Wātū me ngā tepe wā o ia rā hei ārai i te nui o te whakamahinga.
- Ūkuia ngā kupu karo AI puta noa i te wheako.
